Put on your headphones 

Close your eyes 

Find enemy with your ears 

Kill them with your sword in your hand!

 Please judge enemy's position with their breath!
Welcome tutorial page!\n Please choose the practice type

Left tutorial: cut your left enemy with your phone face up!\nAfter you select test button, you should finish the attack action in three seconds.\n Attention, after every action, you should keep still until the vibration remind!

Center tutorial: cut your forward enemy with your phone side up!\nAfter you select test button, you should finish the attack action in three seconds.\n Attention, after every action, you should keep still until the vibration remind!

Right tutorial: cut your right enemy with your phone back up!\nAfter you select test button, you should finish the attack action in three seconds.\n Attention, after every action, you should keep still until the vibration remind!
